text:
Dollar Shave Club | Product Managers, Engineers, etc. | Full-Time | Marina del Rey (Los Angeles), CA | ONSITE | https://www.dollarshaveclub.com

We are hiring product managers, engineers, designers, marketers, and much more.

Our current technical stack is:

- Frontend: node.js, Ember, but transitioning to React, Redux, TypeScript

- Backend: Rails, Elixir

- Mobile: Swift, Java

- Infrastructure: Go

Here are some listings, but feel free to visit https://jobs.jobvite.com/dollarshaveclub or email me at jon.ong@dollarshaveclub.com:
